a1: No, all data is randomly generated using common name and address databases. No real personal information is used.
a2: Yes, you can export generated data as CSV or JSON files for use in your projects.
q3: How many records can I generate?
a3: You can generate between 1 and 100 records at a time.
q4: Can I choose which fields to include?
a4: Yes, you can toggle individual fields (name, email, phone, address, company) on or off.
